plot: A journey of Romani immigration through time, via an internal monologue. From nomadic life to permanent settlement and from the persecutions of the past to every day life of the present.
title: Gras
plot_es: A journey of Romani immigration through time, via an internal monologue. From nomadic life to permanent settlement and from the persecutions of the past to every day life of the present.
